jobDescription: Company ProfileWho We Want Have you always excelled at building technology solutions? Do you enjoy working on Data problems at a massive (many TB) scale? Are you the type that is always looking to squeeze performance and push your hardware to the limits? If yes, then we want you.  We are looking for the best. We need a Data Engineer to help our engineering team build a modern data processing platform. We are investing resources into setting up a more flexible and scalable data infrastructure to support the addition of new data sets and improve overall data quality. An ideal candidate will be excited to be in a smaller company that moves quickly on a constant flow of ideas, is able to weed through the maze of available technologies and possible approaches to find the solutions that work.
